text: <@U7SL518D6> Thank you for the insight! Unfortunately no its not something we can just use personalizations for. I need to run an function on my site that generates 9 recommended prodcuts from our inventory based on the HS contacts previous quiz results (stored in our appâ€™s DB). Thank you again for your reply!

For anyone that finds this issue later, the column stacking problem is only an issue on GMail for iOS (pretty popular client). Multiple different solutions can be found here: <https://github.com/mjmlio/mjml/issues/1243> ( i just removed all spaces between columns in the rendered hubl html)
Hello everyone!!! I was wondering if the dnd areas module will be available for developing email templates ?
